topics.title: Formal Languages
topics.content: Formal languages are sets of strings defined over an alphabet...
examples: Example 2: L = {w | w has equal 0's and 1's}

topics.title: Automata
topics.content: Automata are abstract machines for recognizing languages...
examples: DFA for L = {w | w ends in 01}
NFA for L = {w | w contains substring 'abc'}
